⟨b.red⟩error: emoji, CJK, bidi
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:5:9
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨blu⟩ 5 | ⟨reset⟩message 🐈<U+200D>⬛ {
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩    ⟨b.red⟩^^^^^^^^^^^^ ⟨b.red⟩
⟨blu⟩ 6 | ⟨reset⟩  string 黑猫 = 1;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩     ⟨b.blu⟩---- ⟨b.blu⟩note: some surfaces render CJK as sub-two-column
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨blu⟩  ::: bar.proto:1:9
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨blu⟩ 1 | ⟨reset⟩import "חתול שחור.proto";
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩    ⟨b.blu⟩--------------- ⟨b.blu⟩bidi works if it's quoted, at least
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: bidi (Arabic, Hebrew, Farsi, etc) is broken in some contexts
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:7:10
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨blu⟩ 7 | ⟨reset⟩  string القطة السوداء = 2;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩     ⟨b.red⟩^^^^^^^^ ⟨b.red⟩
⟨reset⟩

⟨reset⟩
